author: Sarah Thompson
content: Has anyone found that their stomach had a negative reaction to pork chops on the carnivore diet? I had one for lunch for the first time on the diet and my gut feels strange and my anxiety kinda flaired up. It's still my first week on the diet, so that may be part of it. Just wanted y'alls' opinion.
